propertyAnalysis.dataSource: Set at creation by CreateUser, changes via AssignDormHead/RemoveDormHead

propertyAnalysis.dataSource: Set to 'active' at creation, changes via ProcessRemovalRequest

propertyAnalysis.dataSource: Summation of PointDeduction.points across all UserPointDeductionRelation where PointDeduction.status = 'active'

propertyAnalysis.purpose: Whether user is eligible for removal (totalPoints >= 30)
propertyAnalysis.dataSource: Computed as totalPoints >= 30
propertyAnalysis.reasoning: Uses only own entity properties (totalPoints)

propertyAnalysis.purpose: Whether user is currently a dorm head
propertyAnalysis.dataSource: Computed as role === 'dormHead' AND has DormitoryDormHeadRelation
propertyAnalysis.reasoning: Uses own property and relation existence check

propertyAnalysis.dataSource: Set to current timestamp when CreateUser creates the user

propertyAnalysis.dataSource: Updated to current timestamp whenever user properties are modified
